name: Swing Shuttle
description:
You play as a shuttle craft that uses a gravity rope to manoeuvre which latches onto asteroids around you. The aim of the game is to get the high score by shooting/destroying targets and enemies inside the playable area.

controls-

M-shoot

Z-grapple onto asteroid 

Note the HTLM5 version has issues in rendering the tiled background, while running in chrome; the background issue isn’t seen in windows package in 7-zip folder.
